author: Lady And The Lost Boys
title: I Like It When The Lines Aren't Drawn
text: I woke up late again today
that's the third time this week and it's already Wednesday.
I'm letting it all just slip away
At least when I write I feel like I'm doing something
When I was young i never thought it would be this way
I thought I'd be in education until I was at least twenty years of age
I thought that I'd be safe
And when you know too much
it all seems much of nothing and...
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, my break,
And you just bumped bumped into me
And I guess you're pretty sweet so if you want to come back to my place you can pump pump me full of sweet nothings Until the morning breaks.
I think when you ask I'll say
Yes i think when you ask I'll say my name's Orion like the constellation
and what can I say, I know too much...
